text: The 1967 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 29th edition of the women's singles championship. Sachiko Morisawa defeated Naoko Fukatsu in the final by three sets to one, to win the title. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1967 in women's table tennis
title: 1967 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
